definition: tree yielding hard heavy reddish wood
details:
noun
- tree yielding hard heavy reddish wood
- tree or tall shrub with shiny leaves and umbels of fragrant creamy-white flowers
= synonyms: scrub beefwood
- any of several Australian trees of the genus Casuarina yielding heavy hard red wood used in cabinetwork
- any of several heavy hard reddish chiefly tropical woods of the families Casuarinaceae and Proteaceae
- a tropical hardwood tree yielding balata gum and heavy red timber
= synonyms: balata, balata tree, bully tree
